item.text: Now the Philistines fought against Israel. The Israelites fled before the Philistines and many of them fell dead on Mount Gilboa.

The <st data-num="06430" class="">Philistines</st> <st data-num="01692" class="">stayed right</st> <st data-num="0310" class="">on the heels of</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="07586" class="">Saul</st> <st data-num="0310" class="">and</st> his <st data-num="01121" class="">sons</st>. <st data-num="06430" class="">They</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="05221" class="">struck down</st> <st data-num="07586" class="">Saul’s</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">sons</st> <st data-num="03129" class="">Jonathan</st>, <st data-num="041" class="">Abinadab</st>, and <st data-num="04444" class="">Malki-Shua</st>.

The <st data-num="04421" class="">battle</st> <st data-num="03513" class="">was thick</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="05921" class="">around</st> <st data-num="07586" class="">Saul</st>; the <st data-num="03384 07198">archers</st> <st data-num="04672" class="">spotted</st> him and <st data-num="02342 04480 03384">wounded</st> him.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="07586" class="">Saul</st> <st data-num="0559 0413">told</st> his <st data-num="03627" class="">armor</st>-<st data-num="05375" class="">bearer</st>, “<st data-num="08025" class="">Draw</st> your <st data-num="02719" class="">sword</st> and <st data-num="01856" class="">stab</st> me with it. <st data-num="06435" class="">Otherwise</st> <st data-num="0428" class="">these</st> <st data-num="06189" class="">uncircumcised people</st> will <st data-num="0935" class="">come</st> and <st data-num="05953" class="">torture</st> me.”<n id="1" /> But his <st data-num="03627" class="">armor</st>-<st data-num="05375" class="">bearer</st> <st data-num="03808 014">refused</st> to do it <st data-num="03588" class="">because</st> he <st data-num="03372" class="">was</st> <st data-num="03966" class="">very</st> <st data-num="03372" class="">afraid</st>. So <st data-num="07586" class="">Saul</st> <st data-num="03947" class="">took</st> the <st data-num="02719" class="">sword</st> and <st data-num="05307" class="">fell</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> it.

When his <st data-num="03627" class="">armor</st>-<st data-num="05375" class="">bearer</st> <st data-num="07200" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="03588" class="">that</st> <st data-num="07586" class="">Saul</st> <st data-num="04191" class="">was dead</st>, <st data-num="01931" class="">he</st> <st data-num="01571" class="">also</st> <st data-num="05307" class="">fell</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> his <st data-num="02719" class="">sword</st> and <st data-num="04191" class="">died</st>.

So <st data-num="07586" class="">Saul</st> and his <st data-num="07969" class="">three</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">sons</st> <st data-num="04191" class="">died;</st> his <st data-num="03605" class="">whole</st> <st data-num="01004" class="">household</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="04191" class="">died</st> <st data-num="03162" class="">together</st>.<n id="2" />
When all the Israelites who were in the valley saw that the army had fled and that Saul and his sons were dead, they abandoned their cities and fled. The Philistines came and occupied them.
The next day, when the Philistines came to strip loot from the corpses, they discovered Saul and his sons lying dead on Mount Gilboa.

They <st data-num="06584" class="">stripped</st> his corpse and then <st data-num="05375" class="">carried off</st> his <st data-num="07218" class="">head</st> and his <st data-num="03627" class="">armor</st>. They <st data-num="07971" class="">sent</st> messengers <st data-num="05439" class="">throughout</st> the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> of the <st data-num="06430" class="">Philistines</st> <st data-num="01319" class="">proclaiming the news to</st> their <st data-num="06091" class="">idols</st> and their <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st>.

They <st data-num="07760" class="">placed</st> his <st data-num="03627" class="">armor</st> in the <st data-num="01004" class="">temple</st> of their <st data-num="0430" class="">gods</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="08628" class="">hung</st> his <st data-num="01538" class="">head</st> in the <st data-num="01004" class="">temple</st> of <st data-num="01712" class="">Dagon</st>.

When <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the residents of <st data-num="03003" class="">Jabesh</st> <st data-num="01568" class="">Gilead</st> <st data-num="08085" class="">heard</st> about <st data-num="03605 0834">everything</st> the <st data-num="06430" class="">Philistines</st> had <st data-num="06213" class="">done</st> to <st data-num="07586" class="">Saul</st>,
all the warriors went and recovered the bodies of Saul and his sons and brought them to Jabesh. They buried their remains under the oak tree in Jabesh and fasted for seven days.
So Saul died because he was unfaithful to the Lord and did not obey the Lord’s instructions; he even tried to conjure up underworld spirits.
He did not seek the Lord’s guidance, so the Lord killed him and transferred the kingdom to David son of Jesse.
